<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e8602f953b0bf77d15b99ad62673b90e/tumblr_inline_ng501hEMDG1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>We received a lot of great suggestions for what to name update 0.90, but we liked ours “beta.” KSP 0.90 is officially named <strong>"Beta Than Ever."</strong><br/><br/>Not quite beta, but still really neat, is this neat pic by <strong>MartGonzo</strong>.</p>

HYPE HYPE HYPE! Yes!

Edited December 6, 2014 by zekes
Please tell me that's actual rocket exhaust and not just the launch pad exploding.
Oh snap, do i spy new KSC terrain?

Please tell me that's actual rocket exhaust and not just the launch pad exploding.

Ok, I won't tell you.

It is just the launchpad exploding

Please tell me that's actual rocket exhaust and not just the launch pad exploding.

All part of the plan *cough*

Wait in that pic where did the KSC mountains go ?????

is the KSC in a new orientation, is there a new height map ?

HYPE
Something tells me that KSC isn't the current one...

It does look like new terrain, but we'll have to wait until it goes public before we can see whether or not there were changes. It might be new mountains, but that's also about where the runway should be...
Im thinking V.90 within 2 weeks and it will definitely be here by xmass.

It does look like new terrain, but we'll have to wait until it goes public before we can see whether or not there were changes. It might be new mountains, but that's also about where the runway should be...

I want to say, it looks a lot like RSS...

There's seems to be some misunderstanding that that pic is in some way representative of the upcoming version.

it isn't I'm afraid, it's just a modded 0.25

I want to say, it looks a lot like RSS...

Yes, RSS with the RVE visual enhancements mod
It should be "keta" instead of "beta", because kerbals like to name things with K XD
Hmmm more graphical effects with the atmosphere intresting I wonder how well my computer will work in 90.

There's seems to be some misunderstanding that that pic is in some way representative of the upcoming version.

it isn't I'm afraid, it's just a modded 0.25

Spot on. Didn't have any approved pics to work with, I'm afraid, so something cool looking was picked.
I was wondering how long it would take people to find that out.

The terrain is scaled down so much because they are likely using RSS, which stretches all terrain by a factor of ten, flattening mountains. Achieving orbit also takes around 9km/s delta-v so that is why the rocket is so huge.

It should be "keta" instead of "beta", because kerbals like to name things with K XD

No, they don't. There's not a single thing in the game that is a regular word with the first letter replaced with K.

ÃŽÂ²etÃ‰â„¢.

Please, on the promotional poster, write it like that.

Beta symbol, and the rest is British English phonetics. Together, it reads "better", while looking like "beta".
:-( Was I the only one that took this as a release announcement and went to the store to download the new version? Doh!

No, they don't. There's not a single thing in the game that is a regular word with the first letter replaced with K.

Except for the part in the loading screen where it says "adding K to every word" ...

Except for the part in the loading screen where it says "adding K to every word" ...

Except for the fact that they don't add K to any words in that sentence.

If we REALLY want to have the kerbal spirit then we must scream KHYPE not KYPE!! KHYPE KHYPE KHYPE!!

Added KHYPE to chromes dictionary XD

:-( Was I the only one that took this as a release announcement and went to the store to download the new version? Doh!
